name: 10 Quality Requirements
title: 10 Quality Requirements
body:
Original Confluence URL: https://qbdocs.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/IAM/pages/3754197003 - please cross-check the quality of the ZD article with the Confluence counterpart and remove this line before publishing the ZD article

shall = strongest, absolut must have; should = less strong, somehow necessary; will = nice to have

ID

Title

Requirement

10k user import

Tivian Access 2.0 shall be able to import 10k new users within 1 hour.

Assumption: We are mainly targeting companies with a maximum of 10k employees with the combined offering.

10k user updates

Tivian Access 2.0 shall be able to update 5k users within 20 minutes.

Assumptions: We are mainly targeting companies with a maximum of 10k employees and a maximum of half of them have to be updated in a reimport of users.

number of concurrent users

number of users for an import and duration of import

number of expected tenants

number of expected API calls

user experience - performance

page reaction time

follow style guide

security scenarios??

Threat Modelling?!?
